title: Graduate Employment Competency Design through Vocational Education Quality Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of vocational education systems and employment support programs
context.additional_context: Strategic development through correlation analysis between educational quality and employment capabilities when designing vocational training for practicing professionals

learning_goals: The relationship between educational quality and employment competencies can be quantitatively evaluated using the Delphi method and empirical analysis
Human capital elements (expertise, growth capacity) can be systematically incorporated when designing educational curricula
Actionable educational improvement plans applicable to real-world corporate environments can be derived through project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
